mapper.select: SELECT t1.dict_label name, COUNT(ri.room_id) value FROM ( SELECT sdd.dict_value, sdd.dict_label FROM sys_dict_type sdt LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data sdd ON sdt.dict_type = sdd.dict_type WHERE sdt.dict_type = 'room_status' ) t1 LEFT JOIN t_room_info ri ON t1.dict_value = ri.room_status AND ri.room_type = #{roomType} AND ri.space_id = #{spaceId} GROUP BY t1.dict_label

SELECT t.room_name, t.room_type, t.lease_end_time FROM (SELECT ci.contract_number, TO_DAYS(ci.lease_end_time) - TO_DAYS( NOW()) surplus, ri.room_name, ri.room_type, ci.contract_status, ci.lease_end_time FROM t_contract_info ci LEFT JOIN t_room_info ri ON ci.room_id = ri.room_id WHERE ci.contract_status = 0 AND TO_DAYS(ci.lease_end_time) - TO_DAYS( NOW()) > 0 AND ci.space_id = #{spaceId}) t WHERE (t.room_type = 2 AND t.surplus < #{apartmentRemind}) OR (t.room_type <> 2 AND t.surplus < #{officeShopRemind})

SELECT t2.nick_name, t2.dict_value, t2.credential_expire_time FROM (SELECT ci.credential_id, su.nick_name, t1.dict_label, t1.dict_value, ci.credential_expire_time, TO_DAYS(ci.credential_expire_time) - TO_DAYS( NOW()) surplus FROM t_credential_info ci LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON ci.user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT sdd.dict_value, sdd.dict_label FROM sys_dict_type sdt LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data sdd ON sdt.dict_type = sdd.dict_type WHERE sdt.dict_type = 'credential_type') t1 ON ci.credential_type = t1.dict_value WHERE TO_DAYS(ci.credential_expire_time) - TO_DAYS( NOW()) > 0 AND ci.space_id = #{spaceId}) t2 WHERE t2.surplus < 20
